usage.dau_mau.rationale: Stickiness is low at 0.25, indicating a declining trend in user engagement. The 7-day DAU is unstable with only 4 unique users in the last 30 days.

actions.action: Analyze user feedback to identify engagement barriers
Implement targeted re-engagement campaigns
Enhance content offerings based on user interests

usage.creators_ratio.rationale: The creator share is only 40% out of 5 active users, which is below the target threshold. This indicates a material risk in creator engagement.

actions.action: Identify barriers to creator engagement
Implement targeted outreach to potential creators
Enhance creator support resources

usage.session_depth.rationale: The average session duration and page depth are near target, but there are clear risks due to low repeat frequency for some users.

actions.action: Encourage users with low repeats to engage more frequently
Analyze content engagement to identify areas for improvement

usage.drilldown.rationale: Drill was used in only ~67% of sessions, which is below the target threshold. This indicates a material risk in user engagement with drill features.

actions.action: Increase training sessions for users on drill features
Enhance visibility of drill options in the UI
Collect user feedback to identify barriers to using drill

reliability.refresh_timeliness.rationale: Only 66.67% of dashboards are within their SLA, with one dashboard significantly stale. This indicates material risks to data reliability.

actions.action: Refresh the stale dashboard (kpi_sales) immediately
Implement monitoring for dashboard refresh statuses
Review and adjust refresh schedules for all dashboards

features.cross_links.rationale: Only 2 out of 3 dashboards have links, resulting in a low percentage of 66.67%. The link usage is also limited, indicating material risks in dashboard connectivity.

actions.action: Increase link usage on 'kpi_sales' dashboard
Review and enhance link strategies across all dashboards
Conduct user feedback sessions to identify link needs

governance.coverage.rationale: Two dashboards are certified and owned, but one dashboard lacks certification and metadata, indicating clear risks to address.

actions.action: Certify the sales dashboard
Complete metadata for the sales dashboard

data.source_diversity.rationale: Five sources across three domains indicate a good level of diversity, meeting the target with minor risks due to the lack of recent additions.

actions.action: Evaluate potential new sources to enhance data diversity

democratization.self_service.rationale: Only 40% of users are creators, which is below the target threshold. This indicates a material risk in creator engagement and department coverage.

actions.action: Increase training sessions for potential creators
Implement incentives for users to become creators
Conduct surveys to understand barriers to creator participation

decision.traceability.rationale: Approximately 100% of decisions reference dashboards, with strong evidence available for each. This indicates a good level of traceability in decision-making.

actions.action: Continue to ensure all decisions are linked to dashboards
